/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement within the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
